content.en: Video Streaming Optimization: Researchers are exploring various ways to optimize the cost and quality of video streaming services in the cloud. Algorithms play a crucial role in these efforts, as they are used to optimize routing, deployment of infrastructure, transcoding, content placement, resource allocation, and more. By leveraging algorithms, video service providers can achieve a balance between cost and user experience, minimize operational costs, and ensure quality of service.
content.da: Video Streaming Optimering: Forskere udforsker forskellige måder at optimere omkostningerne og kvaliteten af video streaming tjenester i skyen. Algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i disse bestræbelser, da de anvendes til at optimere routing, implementering af infrastruktur, transcoding, placering af indhold, ressourceallokering og mere. Ved at udnytte algoritmer kan videotjenesteudbydere opnå en balance mellem omkostninger og brugeroplevelse, minimere driftsomkostninger og sikre kvaliteten af tjenesten.
